SEARCH

Class homepageController

java.lang.Object
homepageController
public class homepageController extends Object
Controller class for the main dashboard (Home Page). This class handles the core administrative functionalities of the library system, including:
  • Adding new Books and CDs.
  • Searching for media items.
  • Managing registered users (listing, deleting).
  • Sending overdue email notifications.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Zainab

  • Constructor Details

    • homepageController

      public homepageController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller class. This method is automatically called after the FXML file has been loaded. It sets up table columns, loads data, and configures UI behavior.

    • setCurrentUsername

      public void setCurrentUsername(String username)
      Sets the current username on the welcome label.
      Parameters:
      username - The name of the logged-in user.

    • handleLogout

      private void handleLogout()
      Handles the logout action. Loads the login screen and closes the current dashboard.

    • handleAddBook

      void handleAddBook()
      Handles adding a new Book or CD to the library. Validates input fields, checks for duplicate ISBNs, and saves the new item to the file.

    • handleSearch

      void handleSearch()
      Handles searching for media items based on criteria. Filters the table view based on Title, Author, or ISBN.

    • handleReload

      void handleReload()
      Reloads data from the file and refreshes the table view. Useful for updating the view after external changes.

    • loadMediaFromFile

      private void loadMediaFromFile()
      Loads media items from 'books.txt'. Parses the file and populates the media list. Also calculates fines for overdue items.

    • saveAllMediaToFile

      private void saveAllMediaToFile()
      Saves all current media items to the 'books.txt' file.

    • getUserMembership

      private String getUserMembership(String username)
      Retrieves the membership type for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      username - The username to check.
      Returns:
      The membership type (Gold/Silver), defaults to Silver if not found.

    • getUserEmail

      private String getUserEmail(String username)
      Retrieves the email address for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      username - The username to check.
      Returns:
      The email address, or an empty string if not found.

    • loadUsersFromFile

      private void loadUsersFromFile()
      Loads registered users from 'users.txt' into the table view. Excludes Admin accounts from the view.

    • handleDeleteUser

      void handleDeleteUser()
      Deletes a selected user. Ensures the user has no active loans before deletion.

    • saveUsersToFile

      private void saveUsersToFile()
      Saves the list of users to 'users.txt'.

    • showAlert

      private void showAlert(String title, String content)
      Shows an information alert dialog.

      Includes a check for the JavaFX Application Thread to support unit testing.

      Parameters:
      title - The title of the alert.
      content - The content message.

    • handleSendReminder

      void handleSendReminder()
      Sends an email reminder to a selected user regarding overdue books. Uses the Observer pattern to trigger the notification.
